#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define FOR(i,b) for(typeof(b) i = 0; i<b; ++i)
#define FORR(i,a,b) for(typeof(b) i= a; i<=b; ++i)
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define sz(c) c.size()
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define x first
#define y second

using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;

const ll mod = 1e9+7;
const int SIZE = 1e5+5;
const ll inf = 0x7fffffff;

void deep(const string& s){
    int l=sz(s);
    FOR(i,l)
        putchar_unlocked(s[i]);
}

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    string x,y;
    int tt;
    map<int,string> ans;
    ans[0]="NO\n";
    ans[1]="YES\n";
    cin>>tt;
    while(tt--){
        cin>>x>>y;
        sort(all(x));
        sort(all(y));
        deep(ans[x==y]);}
        return 0;}
